tool_description:
Currently Get Video Streams on (YouTube & Facebook + Instagram & TikTok & Vimeo & Koo & Pintrest & 9Gag & Tumblr & Imdb & Ted ) (Without watermark), 
and as soon we add more platform social media like ( Twitter, Snapchat, Likree, reddit,). This api  offers you to download videos in multiple formats including MP4, M4A, 3GP, MP3 from multiple sources which include.
name: Fast TubeDown Videos Api
title: Fast TubeDown Videos Api

api_list.name: TED Downloader  Mp4 & Mp3
api_list.description:
**Download or stream TED  Videos/MP4.
**
It is a web service that empowers its users to download or stream TED  videos. It is open for Freemium use. It can be used to embed your favorite TED videos anywhere and also if you want to deal with deeper details of the video and want to play it yourself then you can use the video info JSON object provided by the API and do whatever you want.
